2. Strengthen the Existing Sources of Public Radio Programs
A. Develop International Sources
B. Analyze services of the Broadcasting Foundation of
America.
C. Make grants to individual stations for production
of programs and series.
D. Continue the WGBH Drama Project.
E. Expand the National Educational Radio Network by
providing a modest production capability and increased
tape program distribution. (Note: The network would
not utilize the program sources listed above prior to
Phase IV)
Necessary Task: Lowering interconnection rates to a free or
economically acceptable level.
PHASE II Initial Operation (July 1 - September 30, 1969
one hour daily)
During this phase, the network will broadcast one hour per day.
